content:
For the Da Vinci CDEX There were 12 outstanding trackers that still need a WG vote before we can complete the ballot reconciliation and reballoting. I grouped them in Block-Vote-5 scheduled for the next Patient Care Co-Chair Call Monday Nov 9 05:00 PM (Eastern Time, GMT -04 DST). If there are any items below that you would like to withdraw from the block vote for discussion please email me.

CDEX CI Build: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-ecdx/index.html

Call details: Join Zoom Meeting - https://zoom.us/j/5328571160 | Meeting ID: 532 857 1160 | +1 929-436-2866-US (New York) | Find your local number: Find your local number: https://zoom.us/u/aemmW7I5Zo

Issue key: Summary (Reporter) - Resolution

  1. FHIR-23675: "This seems like a catch all to justify taking any info for any reason. It is far too general to appropriately safeguard patient data. Also, it seems unclear as to how this is a permissible minimum necessary sharing method. - CDex #310" (tcunningham) - Persuasive
  2. FHIR-23587: We need to assure that this document works in concert with the X12 transactions. - CDex #212 (mrocca) - Not Persuasive
  3. FHIR-23586: Do UDI and UDI-DI have LOINC codes? - CDex #211 (mrocca) - Not Persuasive
  4. FHIR-23524: This needs to actually use a urn. - CDex #142 (pknapp) - Not Persuasive
  5. FHIR-23501: We suggest that the scope is clarified to understand what the target is for STU 1.0.0 and provide comments accordingly.. - CDex #119 (hbuitendijk) - Persuasive with Modification
  6. FHIR-23470: need to note RELMA HIPAA Tab - CDex #62 (durwin_day) - Considered for Future Use
  7. FHIR-23465: General clean up is suggested. - CDex #57 (durwin_day) - Persuasive with Modification
  8. FHIR-23440: This does not seem to be a separate use case from the others. - CDex #27 (wgsuarez) - Not Persuasive
  9. FHIR-23436: suggest moving from the previous use case the references to HEDIS/Stars Program into the examples in this use case. - CDex #23 (wgsuarez) - Persuasive with Modification
  10. FHIR-22943: HRex Organization makes NPI or Tax Id mandatory (sreekanthpuram) - Not Persuasive
  11. FHIR-22941: Set an expiration time for the resources created (sreekanthpuram) - Persuasive with Modification
  12. FHIR-21291: Explain why payers can't use HIE aggregate data (nradov) - Persuasive with Modification
2) In addition, on that call, FHIR-23441 needs to be re-opened and redispositioned to consider for future use since we are unable to apply it prior to ballot.
